name: God's Dice
description:
In God's Dice, you play as God, trying to make the perfect village.  Unfortunately, a perfect village requires perfect inhabitants.  And the only way to get perfect inhabitants is by evolving generations of people with dice.

This game was partially inspired by Einstein's quote, "[God] does not throw dice," and Niels Bohr's response, "Stop telling God what to do."
